review: This inhaler is so overpriced it is a joke. I experience side effects from it immediately as bronchospasm. Pharmacies should have to pay patients to use it, rather than paying the docs.
Too expensive. I use sparingly and often have to go without when I can't afford the high cost of the refill since my insurance doesn't cover it.
I could not be without Pro-Air. I take it with me everywhere I go, it works very fast and is a lot less expensive than my other inhalers.
Improved breathing 50% the frist time I used it.
